<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Interaction

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Removes all unit's user added actions.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''removeAllActions''' unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - unit, vehicle or static object

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[removeAllActions]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[actionIDs]], [[actionParams]], [[addAction]], [[setUserActionText]], [[inGameUISetEventHandler]], [[showHUD]], [[inputAction]], [[removeAction]], [[action]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class='command_description'>
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on 30 October, 2013	 </dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Druid|Druid]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Syntax of this command was until Arma 3 ver. 1.06: ''unit'' '''removeAllActions''' ''number''

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
